english.segment1: Sunshine, won't you be my mother. Sunshine, come and help me sing. My heart is darker than these oceans. My heart is frozen underneath
english.segment2: We are crooked souls trying to stay up straight, Dry eyes in the pouring rain well. The shadow proves the sunshine. The shadow proves the sunshine
english.segment3: To scared that I'll run always. Hold fast to the break of day light were. The shadow proves the sunshine
english.segment4: Oh Lord, why did you forsake me?. Oh Lord, don't be far away away. Storm clouds gathering beside me. Please Lord, don't look the other way
english.segment5: Crooked souls trying to stay up straight. Dry eyes in the pouring rain well. The shadow proves the sunshine. The shadow proves the sunshine
english.segment6: To scared that I'll run always. Hold fast to the break of day light were. The shadow proves the sunshine. The shadow proves the sunshine
english.segment7: Yeah Yeah, shine on me. Yeah Yeah, shine on me. Yeah Yeah, shine on me. Yeah Yeah, shine on me
english.segment8: Crooked souls trying to stay up straight. Dry eyes in the pouring rain well. The shadow proves the sunshine. The shadow proves the sunshine
english.segment9: To scared that I'll run always. Hold fast to the break of day light were. The shadow proves the sunshine. The shadow proves the sunshine
english.segment10: Yeah Yeah, shine on me. Yeah Yeah, shine on me. Yeah Yeah, shine on me
english.segment11: Shine on me, Shadow proves the sunshine
